outputs.output_descr: A project is for capacity assessment of the Joint UN Team on AIDS, to support effective development and implementation of the Essential Services package (ESP) on HIV and AIDS for 128 Community Councils in 10 districts.

project_descr: A project is for capacity assessment of the Joint UN Team on AIDS, to support effective development and implementation of the Essential Services package (ESP) on HIV and AIDS for 128 Community Councils in 10 districts.
